column4: Can anybody tell me if I need to download drivers to get sound?
there aren't really any drivers to download
not the dell sblive, is it?
sanity check: is the volume up?
is it new? Or have you had it since you installed ubuntu?
do lspci. Are there any sound cards listed?
is it a card or onboard?
are you looking in your machine?
what color is the port it's plugged into?
no, but don't kill youself reaching around the desk
when did you put this computer together?
do you remember if the sound card was new?
I'm trying to figure out if you have an ISA card (really old), in which case, it wouldn't show up in lspci
